attributes.action: Implement same border force arrangements as Australia
attributes.additional_details: Because the majority of British people do not want illegal entry of anyone into the UK
attributes.background: Take back control of our borders which was promised if Brexit was achieved by Implementing the same border force arrangements as Australia have done whereby any illegal vessel entering UK waters is removed from said UK waters hence ending the illegal entry of thousands every day

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about illegal immigration, but we're not sure whether this means you would like offshore processing, which happens in Australia, when you say you would like to remove illegal vessels on UK waters.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
